title: This Mac clipboard manager app will help you find anything you've ever copied | Flipboard
text: This Mac clipboard manager app will help you find anything you've ever copied The Paste - Endless Clipboard app for the Mac, iPhone and iPad lets you search through unlimited clipboard history. [Steve Levitt](/@stlevitt) flipped this story into [Mac and IOS tips](/@stlevitt/mac-and-ios-tips-eojb7ua2z)•10h Related storyboards Related articles [Do’s and don’ts for cleaning your dirty AirPods Pro and charging case](/@stlevitt/mac-and-ios-tips-eojb7ua2z/do-s-and-don-ts-for-cleaning-your-dirty-airpods-pro-and-charging-case/a-y2J371HlQyOgta3b7mxpdg%3Aa%3A3854352-d29ea6542a%2F9to5mac.com) With an in-ear design, AirPods Pro can become dirty more quickly than AirPods. But cleaning them is easy enough when you know what to avoid and what tools are best. Read on for how to clean AirPods Pro and the charging case with step-by-step do’s and don’ts.
